profileScraperMode.title: Profile Scraper Mode
profileScraperMode.description: Choose the mode for scraping LinkedIn profiles. The Short mode provides basic information, while the Full mode includes full detailed profile data.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of profiles to scrape
maxItems.description: Maximum number of profiles to scrape. The actor will stop scraping when this limit is reached.

companies.title: Companies
companies.description: Search employees of these companies. Provide full LinkedIn URLs. Example: `https://www.linkedin.com/company/google`

locations.title: Locations Filter
locations.description: Filter employees by these LinkedIn locations. Example: `San Francisco`. LinkedIn does not always understand your text queries. For example for "UK" query it will apply "Ukraine" location, so you should use "United Kingdom" in this case. Try this out first in the location filter input of LinkedIn search at `https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/people/?geoUrn=%5B%22103644278%22%5D` - we will use the first suggestion from the autocomplete popup when you type your location

jobTitles.title: Job Title Filter
jobTitles.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn job titles. Example: `Software Engineer`.

industryIds.title: Industry IDs Filter
industryIds.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn industry IDs. Example: `4` for 'Software Development'. Full list: `https://github.com/HarvestAPI/linkedin-industry-codes-v2/blob/main/linkedin_industry_code_v2_all_eng_with_header.csv`

yearsAtCurrentCompanyIds.title: Years at Current Company Filter
yearsAtCurrentCompanyIds.description: Filter Profiles by these LinkedIn years at current company IDs. Example: `3` for '3 to 5 years'.

recentlyChangedJobs.title: Recently Changed Jobs Filter
recentlyChangedJobs.description: If enabled, only Profiles of people who have recently changed jobs will be returned.

companyBatchMode.title: Company Batch Mode
enumTitles: One by one. Actor start fee ($0.02) applies for each company.
companyBatchMode.description: Choose how to process the companies. 'All at once' will search employees from all companies in one query, while 'One by one' will process each make a query for each company separately. The start fee will apply for each query.

maxItemsPerCompany.title: Maximum number of profiles to scrape per company (only for 'one by one' Company Batch Mode)
maxItemsPerCompany.description: Maximum number of profiles to scrape. The actor will stop scraping when this limit is reached.

startPage.title: Start Page
startPage.description: The page number to start scraping from. Starts from 1.

takePages.title: Scrape Pages
takePages.description: The number of search pages to scrape. Each page contains 25 profiles.
